theSleuth:TakeInventory.NAME: Take Inventory
theSleuth:TakeInventory.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Retain your hand this turn.
theSleuth:TakeInventory.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Retain your hand this turn.

theSleuth:Diplomacy.NAME: Diplomacy
theSleuth:Diplomacy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card in your hand.

theSleuth:VictoryPose.NAME: Victory Pose
theSleuth:VictoryPose.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! more if an enemy has been slain this combat.

theSleuth:KeyHandgun.NAME: Key/Handgun
theSleuth:KeyHandgun.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block. NL Otherwise, deal !D! damage.

theSleuth:KeyringTommygun.NAME: Tommygun/Keyring
theSleuth:KeyringTommygun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. / Gain !B! Block twice. NL Switches form at the start of your turn.

theSleuth:HairpinMachinegun.NAME: Machinegun/Hairpin
theSleuth:HairpinMachinegun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. / Gain !B! Block twice. NL Switches form whenever played.

theSleuth:SnoopDoggBust.NAME: Snoop Dogg Bust
theSleuth:SnoopDoggBust.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Drop: Apply !M! Weak and 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

theSleuth:BiteHardly.NAME: Bite Hardly
theSleuth:BiteHardly.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Temporary_HP. NL Exhaust.

theSleuth:CandyCorn.NAME: Candy Corn
theSleuth:CandyCorn.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, gain !B! Block.

theSleuth:RetrieveArms.NAME: Retrieve Arms
theSleuth:RetrieveArms.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you draw this card, add a Key/Handgun into your hand. NL Ethereal.
theSleuth:RetrieveArms.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you draw this card, add an upgraded Key/Handgun into your hand. NL Ethereal.

theSleuth:OpportunityCost.NAME: Opportunity Cost
theSleuth:OpportunityCost.DESCRIPTION: Permanently upgrade a card in your hand. NL Lose 1 of each stat. NL Remove this card from your deck. NL Purge.
theSleuth:OpportunityCost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Permanently upgrade a card in your hand. NL Remove this card from your deck. NL Purge.

theSleuth:Treaty.NAME: Treaty
theSleuth:Treaty.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL You and the enemy cannot gain buffs for !M! turn.
theSleuth:Treaty.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL You and ALL enemies cannot gain buffs for !M! turn.

theSleuth:UnDeEscalate.NAME: Un-De-Escalate
theSleuth:UnDeEscalate.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL You and ALL enemies lose 1 stack of all debuffs.
theSleuth:UnDeEscalate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL You lose 1 stack of all debuffs.

theSleuth:FairShake.NAME: Fair Shake
theSleuth:FairShake.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust a card in your hand.

theSleuth:TruffleShuffle.NAME: Truffle Shuffle
theSleuth:TruffleShuffle.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Auto-Parry. NL Deal !D! damage.  NL Purge.

theSleuth:BrassTacks.NAME: Brass Tacks
theSleuth:BrassTacks.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Discard your hand, then draw that many cards.

theSleuth:RetainReturn.NAME: Retain Return
theSleuth:RetainReturn.DESCRIPTION: Return all cards with Retain from your discard pile to your hand. NL At the end of your turn, discard your hand.

theSleuth:BellyOTheWhale.NAME: Belly O' The Whale
theSleuth:BellyOTheWhale.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card in your discard pile.

theSleuth:TripleScuffle.NAME: Triple Scuffle
theSleuth:TripleScuffle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard all cards drawn this way with Retain.

theSleuth:Supermassive.NAME: Supermassive
theSleuth:Supermassive.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your Vim. NL Reflect damage this turn. NL Exhaust.

theSleuth:FoolPlate.NAME: Fool Plate
theSleuth:FoolPlate.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Gain !M! Temporary_HP for each card. NL Exhaust.

theSleuth:Mural.NAME: Mural
theSleuth:Mural.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL If this card enters the discard pile, Exhaust it.

theSleuth:Ignore.NAME: Ignore
theSleuth:Ignore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. NL Add 1 Mural into your hand.

theSleuth:Embarrass.NAME: Embarrass
theSleuth:Embarrass.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Topdeck 1 Mural.

theSleuth:ForceDeck.NAME: Force Deck
theSleuth:ForceDeck.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw 1 card and Topdeck 1 card from your hand.

theSleuth:FudgeDeck.NAME: Fudge Deck
theSleuth:FudgeDeck.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw 1 card and discard 1 card.

theSleuth:FlaskOfWhiskey.NAME: Moonshine
theSleuth:FlaskOfWhiskey.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Imagination. NL Give a card in your hand Retain this combat. NL Purge.

theSleuth:Fortify.NAME: Fortify
theSleuth:Fortify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temp._Imagination. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Topdeck 1 card from your hand.

theSleuth:CandyLeather.NAME: Candy Leather
theSleuth:CandyLeather.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Return an Imagination card from your discard pile to your hand.

theSleuth:Ogle.NAME: Ogle
theSleuth:Ogle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shift the enemy's intent ahead 1 turn. NL Exhaust.
theSleuth:Ogle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Shift the enemy's intent ahead 1 turn. NL Exhaust.

theSleuth:CandyMech.NAME: Candy Mech
theSleuth:CandyMech.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Lose !M! Imagination.
theSleuth:CandyMech.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Lose !M! Imagination.

theSleuth:TheZillyhammer.NAME: The Zillyhammer
theSleuth:TheZillyhammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Lose !M! Imagination.

theSleuth:CandidBullets.NAME: Candid Bullets
theSleuth:CandidBullets.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Strength. NL At the end of your turn, lose 1 Imagination.

theSleuth:ThinkAhead.NAME: Think Ahead
theSleuth:ThinkAhead.DESCRIPTION: Play the top card of your draw pile.

theSleuth:WizardSudoku.NAME: Wizard's Sudoku
theSleuth:WizardSudoku.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL It costs 0 until played.
theSleuth:WizardSudoku.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card and give it Retain this combat. NL It costs 0 until played.

theSleuth:MoustacheFire.NAME: Moustache Fire
theSleuth:MoustacheFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Topdeck a copy of this. NL Exhaust.

theSleuth:WeirdPuzzleShit.NAME: Weird Puzzle Shit
theSleuth:WeirdPuzzleShit.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 more for every 2 cards in your draw pile. NL Add a Moustache_Fire into your hand.
theSleuth:WeirdPuzzleShit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 more for every 2 cards in your draw pile. NL Add an upgraded Moustache_Fire into your hand.

theSleuth:Parry.NAME: Parry
theSleuth:Parry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact. NL Gain !sleuthSecondMagic! Thorns. NL Gain 1 Auto-Parry.

theSleuth:Distill.NAME: Distill
theSleuth:Distill.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a random potion. NL Gain 1 Auto-Parry. NL Purge.

theSleuth:HeartStab.NAME: Heart Stab
theSleuth:HeartStab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Lose 1 of your highest stat.

theSleuth:SpadeDig.NAME: Spade Dig
theSleuth:SpadeDig.DESCRIPTION: Put 1 card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Topdeck a card from your discard pile. NL Lose 1 of your highest stat.

theSleuth:DiamondArmor.NAME: Diamond Armor
theSleuth:DiamondArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard 1 card. NL Lose 1 of your highest stat.

theSleuth:ClubClubClub.NAME: Club Club
theSleuth:ClubClubClub.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL Lose 1 of your highest stat.

theSleuth:TorsoFlail.NAME: Torso Flail
theSleuth:TorsoFlail.DESCRIPTION: Play a card in your discard pile and Exhaust it.

theSleuth:RollBoxcars.NAME: Roll Boxcars
theSleuth:RollBoxcars.DESCRIPTION: Add any 1 of the 4 Midnight Cards to your hand. NL Exhaust.
theSleuth:RollBoxcars.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add any 1 of the 4 upgraded Midnight Cards to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theSleuth:GummyWormZombie.NAME: Gummy Zombie
theSleuth:GummyWormZombie.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Temporary_HP for each card in your hand.

theSleuth:PezUzi.NAME: Pez Uzi
theSleuth:PezUzi.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Temp._Imagination.

theSleuth:BenStillerBust.NAME: Ben Stiller Bust
theSleuth:BenStillerBust.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Drop: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

theSleuth:Unscale.NAME: Unscale
theSleuth:Unscale.DESCRIPTION: You and ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn.
theSleuth:Unscale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL You and ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn.

theSleuth:ThrowHat.NAME: Throw Hat
theSleuth:ThrowHat.DESCRIPTION: Gain 6 Block X times. NL Mill X.
theSleuth:ThrowHat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 6 Block X+1 times. NL Mill X+1.

theSleuth:Leer.NAME: Leer
theSleuth:Leer.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.
theSleuth:Leer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from ALL enemies. NL Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

theSleuth:Taze.NAME: Taze
theSleuth:Taze.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 1 Weak. NL Topdeck a card from your draw pile.

theSleuth:HitTheMattresses.NAME: Hit the Mattresses
theSleuth:HitTheMattresses.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your combined stats. NL Exhaust.
theSleuth:HitTheMattresses.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your combined stats. NL Exhaust.

theSleuth:TootsieRollFrankenstein.NAME: Tootsiestein
theSleuth:TootsieRollFrankenstein.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Imagination card, draw !M! card.

theSleuth:TruffleTrouble.NAME: Truffle Trouble
theSleuth:TruffleTrouble.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less for each Vim card played this combat. NL Deal !D! damage.

theSleuth:Fortune.NAME: Fortune
theSleuth:Fortune.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less for each Temp._Imagination you have. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card.
theSleuth:Fortune.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less for each Temp._Imagination you have. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards.

theSleuth:Tootshotgun.NAME: Tootsie Shotgun
theSleuth:Tootshotgun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Damage is increased by Auto-Parry stacks.

theSleuth:Joust.NAME: Joust
theSleuth:Joust.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if no other cards in your hand are Attacks. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 1 Weak.

theSleuth:Frijolaegis.NAME: Frijolaegis
theSleuth:Frijolaegis.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw this card, add a copy of it into your hand. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

theSleuth:HandCannon.NAME: Hand Cannon
theSleuth:HandCannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Retain your hand this turn.

theSleuth:Conjure.NAME: Conjure
theSleuth:Conjure.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M!: Deal !D! damage. Apply 2 Weak. Apply 2 Vulnerable.

theSleuth:MobRule.NAME: Mob Rule
theSleuth:MobRule.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies become Stunned. NL Topdeck !M! Murals.

theSleuth:Deprogram.NAME: Deprogram
theSleuth:Deprogram.DESCRIPTION: Look at the top 4 cards of your draw pile. NL You may discard any of them. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

theSleuth:Appropriate.NAME: Appropriate
theSleuth:Appropriate.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand. NL Your stats are 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

theSleuth:LeverageHeight.NAME: Leverage Height
theSleuth:LeverageHeight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard !M! card. NL Draw !M! card.
theSleuth:LeverageHeight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard !M! cards. NL Draw !M! cards.

theSleuth:Diabeatdown.NAME: Diabeatdown
theSleuth:Diabeatdown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the enemy with the least HP. If this kills an enemy, repeat it.

theSleuth:FrighteningBeast.NAME: Frightening Beast
theSleuth:FrighteningBeast.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever a card Purges, Topdeck this.

theSleuth:MortholDryax.NAME: Morthol Dryax
theSleuth:MortholDryax.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, discard your hand.

theSleuth:OglogMRubbit.NAME: Oglog M'Rubbit
theSleuth:OglogMRubbit.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, your stats cannot change.

theSleuth:HeroBust.NAME: Hero Bust
theSleuth:HeroBust.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Drop: Prevent the next time you would lose HP.

theSleuth:WeighIn.NAME: Weigh In
theSleuth:WeighIn.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! Weak and !sleuthSecondMagic! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
